personalInfo.education: Central Connecticut State University (2006, Sports Entertainment)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.otherVics: (4) 2008 Vermont Open, New Hampshire Open. 2010 Cape Cod Open. 2012 Massachusetts Open.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Made two starts on PGA TOUR Canada in July and missed the cut in both...Finished T135 at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.

2013: Played in two Web.com Tour events, Chile and Brazil, missing the cut in both.

2012: Closed with a 4-under 67 at Walpole CC to win the Massachusetts Open in his hometown. Overcame a five-stroke deficit on the final day to defeat Michael Ballo, Jr., and Jason Parajeckas.

2011: Held the lead on the weekend at the Massachusetts Open in his home state but struggled coming home to finish T9.

2010: Played in one Web.com Tour event and turned in his best 18-hole score on the circuit when he fired a second-round 65 at the Fresh Express Classic to make the cut after opening with a 74. Had a 71-68 finish to T44 and earn his top Web.com Tour payday ($2,255)...Won the Cape Cod Open. 

2009: Qualified for the U.S. Open and was tied for 53rd after the first round at Bethpage State Park's Black Course. Shot a second-round 76 to miss the cut. 

2008: Played in one Web.com Tour event, making the cut and finishing 65th at the Xerox Classic. Opened with a 2-under 68 at Irondequoit CC in Rochester, N.Y., but faltered the rest of the way with a 73-76-76 finish, pocketing $1,650...Won the Vermont Open, and followed that with a victory in the New Hampshire Open. 

2006: Made his PGA TOUR debut, playing on a sponsor's exemption at the Deutsche Bank Championship. Shot rounds of 74-79 to miss the cut.
tourBios.personal: Attended North Quincy High School in Quincy, Mass...Gravitated to golf because "I was too small and too slow."...If not a golfer, would be an author...Favorite courses are Furnace Brook GC and President GC...Favorites include New England Patriots, Boston Bruins and Boston Red Sox, "South Park," "Seinfeld," "Good Will Hunting," barstool.com. Enjoys vacation in San Francisco and Munich...Would like to trade places for a day with Lil Wayne "for a lot of reasons."...Bucket list includes attending an English Premier League game...Twitter handle is @welchy59.

tourBios.otherVics: (4): 2008 Vermont Open, New Hampshire Open. 2010 Cape Cod Open. 2012 Massachusetts Open.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T44th in 2010 at the Fresh Express Classic at TPC Stonebrae.
